title: Electrical installation:The planning, design and installation of electrical air-conditioning and heating work shall conform to the provisions of Part VIII Building Service Section 2- Electrical Installations
clause_text: Electrical installation:The planning, design and installation of electrical air-conditioning and heating work shall conform to the provisions of Part VIII Building Service Section 2- Electrical Installations. Section 3- Air-conditioning and Heating National Building Code of India.
